verses.name: Isaiah 43:7
verses.text: Even every one that is called by my name: for I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:8
verses.text: Bring forth the blind people that have eyes, and the deaf that have ears.

verses.name: Isaiah 43:9
verses.text: Let all the nations be gathered together, and let the people be assembled: who among them can declare this, and shew us former things? let them bring forth their witnesses, that they may be justified: or let them hear, and say, It is truth.
